name: Broccoli
short_description:
Broccoli contains:
-real and complex numbers,vectors,matrices,functions,polynomials
-function minimizers,evolutionary algorithms,neural networks
-pdfs,cdfs,max-likelihood,regression,DGPs,PRNGs,armax,garch,statistical estimation etc.
-friendly JavaSwingGUI
